name: xxxx.WAD or xxxx.DEH or xxxx.LMP
description: After upgrading (for FREE :-) to The Ultimate DooM We All noticed that, once again, small changes had been made to the first map E1M1. This "screwed up" .LMP and (Alt-)DeathMatch "compatibility" with all previous versions. This would be easily got around by creating a .WAD file of the previous map E1M1 - so, here it is...
